column4: the thing is because i'm totally new to this i don't know how to go about changing anything yet.... the more i play i suppose the easier it will get

last time i rebooted it let me log on- user / password.... (it even made the noise) started to load gnome (at least i think it was gnome)
yeah typing / reading at same time
then no desktop icons/ no taskbar icons / no mose events doing anything
does it work as another user?
matt - have not tryed.. only me / root
X is working tho it seems
i'll give it a go next time i logon
i have 2 use windows to browse etc (and only 1 pc atm)
screw it... i'll be back in 10 mins
i think you should do as Rattboi suggested; delete your settings

you can remove or move the .gnome and .metacity directories in your home directory
